answers.answer: You certainly have been through quite a lot in the past 18 months!Fatty infiltration of the liver can be caused several things.  Alcohol consumption, diet, and weight are all factors that could contribute to fatty liver.  As far as I know, it's not a disease in itself, but a sign that there is something else affecting the liver.  I would ask the doctor for a liver biopsy to determine the exactly how much damage (if any), is present.  I don't know how much a biopsy can help diagnose the cause of liver problems, but it would certainly give your doc a much clearer picture of the health of your liver.  Good Luck!
